revised_title: Advanced Numerical Methods for the Euler Equations in Fluid Dynamics
tldr: The author presents the weighted average flux method (WAF) for solving the Euler equations of gas dynamics, improving upon previous methods like Godunov's method. The WAF method achieves second-order accuracy and can be adapted to one and two-dimensional problems. The article also discusses the construction of oscillation-free versions of the method and provides numerical results for various test problems.
